page.title: 11Public Transport Matfield
page.content: The main{bus services}are provided by the Maidstone and District Bus Company, part of the National network. Two routes converge on Matfield, no.6 (hourly)Maidstone to Tunbridge Wells and no.297(two_hourly) Tunbridge Wells to Tenterden,giving 3 buses every 2 hours to Tunbridge Wells,1 an hour to Paddock Wood(nearest{railway station}) and 1 every 2 hours through Brenchley Goudhurst etc.Evening and Sunday services are very restricted.Route 296 from Tunbridge Wells to Paddock Wood runs three times daily via Petteridge. A private company,Fuggles,operates a limited service,used considerably by school children.They also provide occasional services to coastal towns. {Old Age Pensioners}with an annual pass may travel at{half_price}when buying tickets at off_peak times, return halves may be used on any bus.
